column2: "Na David kehyiahyiaa Israel mbarimba a wɔasan mu eyi hɔn no nyinara bio
"Na David soɛree na ɔnye nkorɔfo a wɔka no ho no nyinara sii mu kɔr Baale-Juda
column3: dɛ wɔrekɛfa Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no a wɔbɔ do dzin no efi hɔ aba
column4: mekyerɛ dɔm EWURADZE a ɔtse kerubfo do no ne dzin no a."

column2: "Na wɔdze Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no sii tseaseanam fofor do
column3: na wɔdze fi Abinadab fi a ɔwɔ koko no do no mu puei: na Uza na Ahio

column2: "Na wɔdze Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no fi Abinadab fie a ɔwɔ koko no do no puei: na Ahio dzii adaka no enyim kɔree."
"Na David na Israel fi nyinara wɔdze kupresidua ahorow
column7: na ɔnye akasaa goree wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Na aber a wodur Nakon ewuporowee no
column3: Uza tseen ne nsa kɛkaa Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no

column2: "Na EWURADZE n'ebufuw dzɛwee wɔ Uza do; na Nyankopɔn bɔɔ no hɔ wɔ no mfom no ntsi
column3: na owui wɔ Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no nkyɛn hɔ."

column2: "Na David dzii yaw
column3: osiandɛ EWURADZE ebu afa Uza do ntsi: na ɔfrɛɛ bea no Perez-Uza a asekyerɛ nye dɛ

column2: "Na David suroo EWURADZE da no; na ɔsee dɛ
column3: EWURADZE n'adakaa no besi dɛn aba me nkyɛn?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi David ammpɛ dɛ oyi EWURADZE n'adakaa no dze kɔ ne nkyɛn wɔ David kurow no mu; na David dze maan nkyɛn kɔr Gitinyi Obed-edom fie."
"Na EWURADZE n'adakaa no kaa Gitinyi Obed-edom fie abosoom ebiasa: na EWURADZE hyiraa Obed-edom
"Na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ ɔhen David dɛ
column5: osian Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no ntsi. Na David dze enyigye sii mu kɔree keyii Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no fii Obed-edom fie dze baa David kurow no mu."

column2: "Na mbrɛ ɔyɛe nye dɛ
column3: sɛ hɔn a wɔso EWURADZE n'adakaa no tu anamɔn esia a
column4: nna ɔdze ɔnantwi na abowa a ɔadɔ seradze abɔ afɔr."

column2: "Na David dze n'ahoɔdzen nyinara sawee wɔ EWURADZE enyim: nna David ɔdze ndwera asɔfo ntar abɔ do."
"Nna David na Israel fi nyinara dze esebɔ
column4: dze EWURADZE n'adakaa no fowee bae."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a EWURADZE n'adakaa no dur David kurow mu no
column4: Saul ne babaa Mikal hwɛɛ tokura mu
column5: na ohun ɔhen David dɛ oruhuruhuruw na ɔresaw wɔ EWURADZE enyim; na obuu no enyimtsia wɔ n'akoma mu."

column2: "Na wɔdze EWURADZE n'adakaa no bae
column3: na wɔdze besii ne sibew wɔ asese a David abɔ ama no ne finimfin: na David bɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr na asomdwee afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Na David wiee ɔhyew afɔr na asomdwee afɔr no bɔ no
column3: ɔdze dɔm EWURADZE ne dzin hyiraa ɔman no."

column2: "Na ɔdze akyɛdze maa ɔman no nyinara
column7: na esikyireamba a wɔabɔ no etɔw. Nna ɔman no nyinara mu obiara sii mu kɔr ne fie."

column2: "Nna David sanee baa dɛ oribehyira ne fiefo. Na Saul ne babaa Mikal puei behyiaa David
column4: Mbrɛ Israelhen n'enyim duae baa nyam ndɛ a
column5: dɛ ɔpaa no ho tam wɔ no nkowaa hɔn mfonabaa enyim
column6: dɛ mbrɛ ehuhufo no mu bi pa no ho tam adapaa mu!"

column2: "Na David see Mikal dɛ
column6: na ɔsaan mu yii me hyɛɛ me ɔpanyin wɔ EWURADZE ne man
column7: Israel do no a; dɛm ntsi mobɔgor wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Na mo ho bɛda ho ayɛ nkɔw asen dɛm
column3: na mebɛyɛ mankasa m'enyi do famufamunyi: na mfonabaa a akasa hɔn ho no mu mbom na wɔbɛhyɛ me enyimnyam."

column2: "Na Saul ne babaa Mikal oennya ɔba dze kodur no wu da."
